summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of certain streets, avenues and alleys, commencing at a point at the intersection of East Waterway and Lander Street; thence east along Lander Street to Ninth Avenue South; thence north along Ninth Avenue South to Bay View Street; thence east on Bay View Street to a connection with the South Tunnel at the alley between Tenth Avenue South and Eleventh Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a main trunk sewer and other appurtenances therein, said trunk sewer to serve also as a sub-sewer or local sewer; providing for establishing a main trunk sewer or drainage district, to be known a the "Lander Street Trunk Sewer District", and providing for the creation of Local Improvement District No. 1542 for the purpose of providing for the payment of said improvement; all in accordance with Resolution No. 653 of the City of Seattle, and appropriating the sum of One Hundred and Twenty-five Thousand ($125,000.00) Dollars out of the sewer fund to apply upon the cost of said improvement, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
